name: Operation Omega
description: This was a game made for my High School Graduation Project in 2010. It is a basic first person shooter game. Works on Windows XP, Vista,7,8, 8.1 and 10. To make sure it can run on your system I have included a system checker with the game. Simply run the program in Can I run FPSC games folder to check your system. If it tells you no, you simply have to install Direct X 9.0c . This Game would be great to see the workings of its level design and how FPSC can be used to build a basic game.  All of the controls are listed in the read me file included with the game.
